pkgmetadata.longdescription: The hydrus network client is an application written for those who have large image/swf/webm collections. It browses with tags instead of folders, a little like a booru on your desktop. Advanced users can share tags and files anonymously through custom servers that any user may run

use.flag: Support working around cloudflare anti-bot page
Show duration and other information on video thumbnails
Enable memory compression in the client
